content.description: A local ice-cream shop sells ice-cream cones for $2.00, and customers can choose from the following options.
content.question: Ice-cream flavorType of cone: sugar or waffleChocolate dipped for an additional $0.50Sprinkles for an additional $0.50Which of the following is a quantitative variable?

choices.label: The total cost of the cone

content.answer: The total cost of the cone

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe data presented numerically or graphically.
